from math import log2, floor
N = int(input())
if N % 2 == 0:
    N //= 2
    ans = N - 2 ** floor(log2(N))
else:
    ans = (N+1) // 2 - 1
print(ans)

from math import log2, floor
N = int(input())
if N % 2 == 0:
    N //= 2
    ans = N - 2 ** floor(log2(N))
else:
    ans = (N+1) // 2 - 1
print(ans)

n = int(input())
if (n % 2 == 1):
    print(n // 2)
    return
i = 1
while (i <= n):
    i *= 2
i //= 2
n -= i
print(n // 2)
